85 template<typename item_type__, class allocator_type__ = NCPP_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR_TEMPLATE<item_type__>>
86 class NCPP_DEFAULT_ALIGNAS cfv_queue_t {
87
91
92#pragma region Typedefs
93 public:
94 using allocator_type = allocator_type__;
95 using item_type = item_type__;
96 using item_vector_type = std::vector<item_type__, allocator_type>;
97 using iterator = item_type__*;
98 using const_iterator = const item_type__*;
99#pragma endregion
100
104
105#pragma region Properties
106 private:
107 item_vector_type item_vector_;
108 asz begin_index_;
109 asz end_index_;
110 sz capacity_;
111 pac::spinlock writer_lock_;
112 pac::spinlock reader_lock_;
113#pragma endregion
114
118
119#pragma region Getters and Setters
120 public:
121 inline iterator begin() { return item_vector_.data() + begin_index_.load(std::memory_order_acquire) % capacity_; }
122 inline const_iterator begin() const { return item_vector_.data() + begin_index_.load(std::memory_order_acquire) % capacity_; }
123 inline const_iterator cbegin() const { return item_vector_.data() + begin_index_.load(std::memory_order_acquire) % capacity_; }
124 inline iterator end() { return item_vector_.data() + end_index_.load(std::memory_order_acquire) % capacity; }
125 inline const_iterator end() const { return item_vector_.data() + end_index_.load(std::memory_order_acquire) % capacity_; }
126 inline const_iterator cend() const { return item_vector_.data() + end_index_.load(std::memory_order_acquire) % capacity_; }
127
128 inline item_type__& front() { return *begin(); }
129 inline const item_type__& front() const { return *begin(); }
130 inline item_type__& back() { return *(item_vector_.data() + (end_index_.load(std::memory_order_acquire) + capacity_ - 1) % capacity_); }
131 inline const item_type__& back() const { return *(item_vector_.data() + (end_index_.load(std::memory_order_acquire) + capacity_ - 1) % capacity_); }
132
133 inline sz size() const {
134 sz end_index = end_index_.load(std::memory_order_acquire);
135 sz begin_index = begin_index_.load(std::memory_order_acquire);
136 return end_index - begin_index;
137 }
138#pragma endregion
139
143
144#pragma region Constructors, Destructor and Operators
145 public:
149 inline explicit cfv_queue_t(sz capacity) :
150 begin_index_(0),
151 end_index_(0),
152 capacity_(capacity)
153 {
154
155 item_vector_.reserve(capacity_);
156 item_vector_.resize(capacity_);
157
158 }
162 inline explicit cfv_queue_t(sz capacity, const allocator_type& allocator) :
163 begin_index_(0),
164 end_index_(0),
165 item_vector_(allocator),
166 capacity_(capacity)
167 {
168
169 item_vector_.reserve(capacity_);
170 item_vector_.resize(capacity_);
171
172 }
176 inline explicit cfv_queue_t() :
177 cfv_queue_t(1024)
178 {
179
180
181
182 }
186 ~cfv_queue_t() {
187

196 cfv_queue_t(other.capacity_)

198
199 item_vector_ = other.item_vector_;
200

208

218

220 other.clear();
221

226 inline cfv_queue_t& operator = (cfv_queue_t&& other) {
227
228 item_vector_ = other.item_vector_;
229 other.clear();
230
231 return *this;
232 }

234#pragma endregion
235
239
240#pragma region Methods
241 private:
242 template<typename item_param_type>
243 inline void push_main_t(item_param_type&& item) {
244
245 utilities::unique_lock_t<pac::spinlock> lock_guard(writer_lock_);
246
247
248
249 sz next = (end_index_ + 1) % capacity_;
250
251 assert(next != begin_index_);
252
253 item_vector_[next] = std::forward<item_param_type>(item);
254
255 begin_index_ = next;
256
257 }
258
262
263 public:
267 inline void clear() {
268
269 std::atomic_thread_fence(std::memory_order_release);
270
271 begin_index_.store(0, std::memory_order_relaxed);
272 end_index_.store(0, std::memory_order_relaxed);
273
274 }
275
279 inline void push(item_type__&& item) {
280
281 push_main_t(std::forward<item_type__>(item));
282 }
286 inline void push(const item_type__& item) {
287
288 push_main_t(item);
289 }
290
294 inline bool try_pop(utilities::lref_t<item_type>& output) {
295
296 if (begin_index_ != end_index_) {
297
298 utilities::unique_lock_t<pac::spinlock> lock_guard(reader_lock_);
299
300 if (begin_index_ != end_index_) {
301
302 output = item_vector_[begin_index_ % capacity_];
303
304 begin_index_ =
305
306 return true;
307 }
308 }
309
310 return false;
311
312 utilities::unique_lock_t<pac::spinlock> lock_guard(reader_lock_);
313
314 sz begin_index = begin_index_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
315
316 sz end_index = end_index_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
317 if (end_index <= begin_index) return false;
318
319 begin_index_.fetch_add(1, std::memory_order_relaxed);
320
321 output = item_vector_[begin_index % capacity_];
322
323 return true;
324 }
325
329 inline bool try_pop(item_type& output) {
330
331 std::atomic_thread_fence(std::memory_order_acq_rel);
332
333 utilities::unique_lock_t<pac::spinlock> lock_guard(reader_lock_);
334
335 sz begin_index = begin_index_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
336
337 sz end_index = end_index_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
338 if (end_index <= begin_index) return false;
339
340 begin_index_.fetch_add(1, std::memory_order_relaxed);
341
342 output = item_vector_[begin_index % capacity_];
343
344 return true;
345 }
346
350 inline bool try_pop() {
351
352 std::atomic_thread_fence(std::memory_order_acq_rel);
353
354 utilities::unique_lock_t<pac::spinlock> lock_guard(reader_lock_);
355
356 sz begin_index = begin_index_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
357
358 sz end_index = end_index_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
359 if (end_index <= begin_index) return false;
360
361 begin_index_.fetch_add(1, std::memory_order_relaxed);
362
363 return true;
364 }
365
369 inline void pop() {
370
371 std::atomic_thread_fence(std::memory_order_acq_rel);
372
373 utilities::unique_lock_t<pac::spinlock> lock_guard(reader_lock_);
374
375 sz begin_index = begin_index_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
376
377 sz end_index = end_index_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
378
379 assert(end_index > begin_index && "the queue is empty.");
380
381 begin_index_.fetch_add(1, std::memory_order_relaxed);
382
383 }
384#pragma endregion
385
386 };

ncpp::containers::cfv_queue_t
A cfv_queue_t is a concurrent queue storing elements inside a fixed vector.
